page.title: 16 Village Shops
page.content: From our survey of three village shops we established that most villagers would not like to see the shops and post offices close, especially pensioners and people without their own transport.The farm shop in our "D" block holds a good stock of green-groceries, eggs and poultry. Most village shops are used only for emergency items and although villagers do not want to see the shops close,they do not give them their full support as they can purchase their goods so much cheaper in the supermarkets,and it is impossible for the smaller shops to compete. There was quite a lot of criticism concerning the stock held by village shops - would people ever be happy on this subject? The shop at Wickham St. Pauls is about to change hands.
